Member Function Documentation

const MBitmap* MBFont::bitmap ( char  c,
bool  ascii = true 
) const

This methods draws a character (c) on the font's bitmap and returns a pointe to the bitmap.

Parameters
cThe character to draw
asciitrue if c is an ascii character or false the font is an icon font
Returns
A pointer to a bitmap or zero if the character could not be loaded
